title: RHOSLC Season 3 PREMIERE Recap!
itunes:title: RHOSLC Season 3 PREMIERE Recap!
description:
Danny recaps the INCREDIBLE season 3 premiere of The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured casting tapes, Seth and Lisa confronting each other, Jen and Mer making up, and SO much more. #CowgirlsAreForever


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
